name: SURRENDER
description:
SURRENDER is the 2D pixels platform game that you can only go forward and avoid some bullets from anybody that you never know who they are!

ROLL ahead!

Open the full of your instinct and JUMP at the right time when you see something coming!

Dodge everything that might kill you and be careful of too much height from the ground.

Use CAMERA to look forward for your advantage.

Stop at the end or stop when you surrender...
